content.prompt: The authors’ discussion in the third paragraph of “the marked acceleration in health care improvements” in China after 1950 refers most directly to which of the following historical developments?

choices.label: The collapse of the Chinese Qing dynasty
The Japanese invasion of Chinese Manchuria
The communist victory in China’s civil war
The market reforms in China after Mao Zedong’s death

topic.text: 9.2: Technological Advances and Limitations after 1900 - Disease

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
